actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: A resolution to provide for issuance of a summons and for related procedures concerning the articles of impeachment against Walter L. Nixon, Jr.

summary.text: Requires the issuance of a summons to Walter L. Nixon, Jr., Judge for the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of Mississippi, commanding an answer to articles of impeachment no later than May 31, 1989. Sets forth related Senate procedure with respect to such summons.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for issuance of a summons and for related procedures concerning the articles of impeachment against Walter L. Nixon, Jr.
